content: With <style=Highlight>Luca</style>, <style=NpcName>Oumuamua</style> weaves nature's cloak, reshaping mountains, rivers, skies, beaches, and seas. Anything can be changed, hoo-oo~!
info: 露卡之心新手引导后回主界面_主流程文本II

content: <style=NpcName>Oumuamua</style> promises, I won't doze off again. I'll be here with the Archiboos, waiting for it, hoo-oo~
info: 露卡之心新手引导后回主界面_主流程文本II
